name: Hublle
author: Hublle

sections.description:
Increase store sales by Abandonment cart recovery, WhatsApp bot, live chat, WhatsApp Shop, confirm cod order and send broadcast.

According to multiple published reports, the average cart abandonment rate is around 70% to 75% and the reason for cart abandonment is different for each industry. If the cart automation is implemented in perfect manner – brands can recover from up to 20% of the cart sales.

Key Features

  • Recover Abandoned Cart with smart campaign and offer discounts.
  • Set up Whatsapp chatbot, allowing to shop, track & replace orders on Whatsapp.
  • COD Confirmation and Convert COD to Prepaid Order Flow to reduce RTO.
  • Automated shipping updates, collect product reviews on Whatsapp.
  • Live Chat and Send Smart Bulk Messages to customers, dynamic segment audience.

Abandoned Cart Recovery:

Hublle.io’s Abandoned Cart Recovery feature is a game-changer in reclaiming lost sales. Leveraging the power of WhatsApp Business APIs, it sends personalized reminders to customers who abandoned their carts. This intelligent solution nudges shoppers to complete their purchases, effectively reducing cart abandonment rates.

Hublle’s Abandoned Cart Recovery modules allows you to offer automated discounts and setup multiple campaigns and track the recovered cart sales.

Remove COD Fake Order by COD Confirmation Flow

Fake COD Order is a real tough situation and puts the huge loss on business. Now, you can instantly get confirmed your COD Order over WhatsApp – as the customer places order on WhatsApp with Hublle’s Confirm COD Order Flow using official Whatsapp Business APIs.

Convert COD Orders to Prepaid:

Reduce your RTO orders and financial loss with Hublle’s Covert COD Orders to Prepaid with integrated all major courier partners. As customer places an COD Order on store, customer directly gets WhatsApp message with the discounted payment link.
By using WhatsApp Business APIs, you can streamline transactions and reduce logistics complexity. Convert Cash on Delivery orders to prepaid, ensuring smooth deliveries and minimizing cancellations.

WhatsApp Chat Widget and Team Inbox

Take customer support to the next level with Hublle.io’s Team Inbox Chat feature powered by WhatsApp Business APIs. Team Inbox allows you to engage with customers, address inquiries, and build trust. Admin can add up multiple agents and can track analytics such as open ticket, resolution time and much more.

WhatsApp Chatbot: – Shop / Track Order

Hublle’s chat bot allows customers to place orders through WhatsApp in both payment options such as Cash on Delivery (COD) and with integrated all major payment gateways such as Cash Free, Razor pay and other payment options.
Hublle’s WhatsApp Chatbot also allows users to track their order on Whatsapp.

Campaign Messages:

Boost engagement and drive conversions with Hublle.io’s Campaign Messages. Through WhatsApp Business APIs, you can craft targeted campaigns and send personalized messages to your customer base.
Promote exclusive offers, discounts, and new arrivals, maximizing your marketing efforts. With Hublle.io’s seamless campaign management, you can amplify brand awareness, nurture leads, and encourage repeat purchases.

About Hublle.io:

We take pride in developing premium WhatsApp commerce solutions for businesses. With over 15 years+ of e-commerce experience specialized WooCommerce plugins, our team is dedicated to delivering exceptional products and services.

Join successful brands in harnessing the power of Hublle.io for WhatsApp commerce success. Our support team is ready to assist you on your journey.

Transform your business with Hublle.io and watch your sales soar! Leave us a FIVE STAR rating and share yur valuable reviews to help others discover the true potential of our platform.

sections.installation:
• Upload courier-home plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ folder and Activate it.
  • It will add a menu ‘Hublle’ in the admin panel in the left menu.
sections.faq:
How to install and use this plugin?

After you Active this plugin, just go to Dashboard > Hublle > Settings, and then setup the default settings, after that, Add Order Pickup Address mean you warehouse address!

How do I report bugs and suggest new features?

You can report the bugs for this CourierHome plugin here

Will you include features to my request?

Yes, Absolutely! We would suggest you submit your feature request here

How do I get in touch?

You can contact us from here

Disclaimer

A lot of studies has been done while making this plugin. Still the plugin is in beginning state. If you’re new to WordPress or have a very limited technical background you may consider seeking out professional help your first time using the plugin.
For any kind of assistance from our side, you can post your suggestions on our support section.
